title: Seven till five
creator_credit: Norman McLaren and Glasgow School of Art
brief_description: An impressionistic live-action study of art school activities from morning to night. This was the first film of the Glasgow School of Art Film Group. It won first prize in the Second Amateur Film Festival in Glasgow, 1934. This film has no dialogue or music effects. Photographed by W.J. Maclean.
